sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Input, FileInput, Textarea, Button } from '@mantine/core'; export default function AddPlaylist() { const [state, setState] = useState({ playlistName: '', tracklist: '' }) const [selectedCover, setSelectedCover] = useState(''); function handleFileInput(e) { setSelectedCover(e.target.files[0]) } function handleSubmit(e) { } return(
